<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/v1/content-router/rules/{id}/toggle"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Enable or disable a content router rule by its ID

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"number"},"in":"path","name":"id","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["enabled"],"additionalProperties":false}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
